sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "../styles/tour-details.css"; import { Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup } from "reactstrap"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import tourData from "../assets/data/tours"; import calulateAvgRating from "./../utils/avgRating"; const TourDetails = () => { const { id } = useParams(); const tour = tourData.find((tour) => tour.id === id); const { photo, title, desc, price, address, reviews, city, distance, maxGroupSize, } = tour; const { totalRating, avgRating } = calulateAvgRating(reviews); return ( <>

{title}

{calulateAvgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating === 0 ? ( "Not rated" ) : ( ({reviews?.length}) )} {address}
{city} ${price} / per person {maxGroupSize}
Description

{desc}

{/* ============== tour reviews section ================= */}

Reviews ({reviews?.length} reviews)

1 2 3 4 5
{/* ============== tour reviews section end ================= */}
); }; export default TourDetails;
